page.title: 15LOCAL NEWS,BUCKHURST HILL
page.content: Our local newspaper is the West Essex Gazzete.There are 9 different editions of it covering 9 different areas.Our edition covers 3 different areas Loughton,Buckhurst Hill and Chigwell. In the local Gazzette office in Loughton there are 3 reporters, receptionist and 2 part time ladies. There are 8 photographers.The part time ladies deal with the advertisements. A whole page advertisement costs Â£1,000.The chief reporter tells people what to do.The reporter we spoke to found the dramatic stories the most interesting and council meetings most boring. The stories for the paper are typed in Loughton then taken to the sub-editors who put it on pages.Then they are sent to Southend for printing. For an example of local news see the next page.
